alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:14PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ROOSEVELT, EAST CENTRAL DE BACA, SOUTHWESTERN QUAY AND CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM MDT... At 913 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from near Bellview to 12 miles southwest of Grady to near Ragland to 10 miles northwest of House. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Melrose, Grady, House, Saint Vrain, Ranchvale, Tolar, Cannon Air Force Base, Broadview and Bellview. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 343 and 389. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Quay County; Roosevelt County
